summary: Took an active role in all stages of the software development life cycle. Spearheaded software development initiatives as a recognized expert in the subject matter, serving as the primary liaison for project management personnel. Orchestrated the seamless adoption of RabbitMQ with horizontal scaling to optimize event management and file processing. Transformed the core backend functionality by migrating from in-memory CQRS to utilizing RabbitMQ, resulting in a highly efficient microservice architecture.

Drafted clear technical documentation, detailing product design specifications. Orchestrated efficient large-scale software deployments with Kubernetes. Trained and mentored junior developers and engineers, teaching skills in scalable microservices deployment and working to improve overall team performance. Updated the dependencies on a handful of older microservices. Decoupling functionalities from various microservices was also worked on for improved CPU and memory consumption.

Wrote and reviewed code for a microservice backend built using MongoDB, Nats Streaming, and WebSocket. Wrote test cases and handled code deployments on AWS EC2 instances. Built co-browsing feature on the sales-key app from start to finish.

Created the UI for the data transformation pipelining tool using Angular 7 and Node.js that was used by big data companies, including Cloudera and Hortonworks. Developed object-oriented software, including Data Transformation for use in the Analytics Industry.
